wizard.info.subtitle: Create Project
wizard.info.description: You can change these details at any time in the project settings.

wizard.invite.description: Invite your team to plan, monitor and carry out the work together.
wizard.alert.title: Create project
wizard.alert.message.sure: Are you sure you want to continue?
wizard.alert.message.invite: You haven't invited anyone to join the project yet. Are you sure you want to continue?
project.invite.title: You have been invited to collaborate on a project!
project.invite.description: By accepting the invitation, project owners can track your activities within the project and access your profile information.
project.invite.alert.success.title: Participation was successful
project.invite.alert.success.message: You are now part of a new project!
project.invite.alert.failed.title: You cannot access this project
project.invite.alert.failed.message: Your invitation has expired, please try again!
project.settings.details.title: Details
project.settings.details.alert.update.ti: Are you sure you want to save?
project.settings.details.toast.update.su: The project details have been changed successfully.
project.settings.details.alert.delete.ti: Are you sure you want to delete the project?
project.settings.details.alert.delete.me: The project and all related information will be permanently deleted.
project.settings.invitations.title: Invitations
project.settings.invitations.subtitle: Access to the project
project.settings.invitations.info: Anyone with access to the site can access the features of this project. In the event that a user has not agreed to participate in the project, they cannot access the features of the same.
project.settings.invitations.null.title: A great job starts with a great team!
project.settings.invitations.null.subtit: Add the people you want to work on the project they will receive a link to take part in the action.

projects.tickets.search.label: Search

projects.tickets.type.label: Type
project.pages.invite.title: Join a project
project.settings.invitations.alert.title: Are you sure you want to continue?
project.settings.invitations.alert.descr: All selected members will receive an invitation to join the project!
project.settings.invitations.toast.succe: All invitations have been sent successfully.
project.settings.invitations.toast.faile: There was a problem sending the invitations.
wizard.toast.failed: There was a problem creating the project.
project.settings.roles.title: Roles
project.settings.roles.subtitle: Assign roles of a Scrum Project
project.settings.roles.info: Each part of the framework has a specific purpose and is essential for the success and use of Scrum! Each role is assigned different permissions in order to take advantage of the functionality of Unijira.
project.settings.roles.null.title: Make the most of the potential of Scrum!
project.settings.roles.null.subtitle: Carefully select the roles to assign to your Scrum Team members, use our tips to improve your Scrum usage.
project.settings.roles.alert.title: Are you sure you want to continue?
project.settings.roles.alert.description: The roles will be assigned to the chosen members.
project.settings.roles.toast.success: The roles have been assigned correctly
project.settings.roles.toast.failed: There was a problem during the role assignment procedure.
project.settings.invitations.null: No user present with the following characteristics
project.settings.roles.null: No user present with the following characteristics
projects.releases.title: Releases
projects.releases.status.label: Status
projects.releases.search.label: Search
projects.releases.view.progress.title: Progress
project.settings.permissions.title: Permissions
project.settings.permissions.subtitle: Change the permissions of your team members
project.settings.permissions.info: With Unijira it is possible to modify the permissions enjoyed by each member of the team at no cost. A fine-grained customization of the permissions is offered in order to meet the different needs. reference to the masks created for each type of role.
project.settings.permissions.alert.title: Are you sure you want to continue?
project.settings.permissions.alert.descr: Users will enjoy the new permissions chosen
project.settings.permissions.toast.succe: The permissions have been changed successfully
project.settings.permissions.toast.faile: A problem occurred during the permissions assignment procedure.
description.placeholder: Landed on moon in 1969, author of The Picture of Dorian Gray
project.settings.permissions.admin.title: Administrator
project.settings.permissions.admin.descr: If enabled, the user will be able to manage permissions for the entire project, ban members, and delete the project.
project.settings.permissions.details.des: Allows access to general project information and modification thereof.
project.settings.permissions.invitations: Allows the user to invite new team members.
project.settings.permissions.roles.title: Access to roles
project.settings.permissions.roles.descr: If enabled, the user will be able to change roles within the project.
project.settings.permissions.null.title: Manage the permissions of your Scrum Project!
project.settings.permissions.null.subtit: Assign project members specific permissions based on their role in the project.
